      • createURL

        public static URL createURL(String name)
                     throws org.apache.uima.util.InvalidXMLException
        Computes the absolute URL for this import, using the relative location or name, whichever is specified by this import object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this import's target.
        Returns:
        the url of the import.
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.util.InvalidXMLException - if the import could not be resolved

      • getFileURI

        public static String getFileURI(File f)
        Return a URI string locator for the File object provided.
        Parameters:
        f - the file to get URI for.
        Returns:
        the file URI.

      • listFiles

        public static List<File> listFiles(File src,
                   FileFilter filter,
                   boolean recurse)
        Return a list of File Objects in a directory. Optionally return only a list of Files that match the given FileFilter. Recurse into subdirectories if indicated. If no filter is provided then return all the files in the directory.
        Parameters:
        src - Source directory where the search will be performed.
        filter - Optional, File filter to limit results that are returned.
        recurse - If true then recurse into subdirectories, only return this directory results if false
        Returns:
        List of File objects found in this directory

      • loadConfigFile

        public static groovy.util.ConfigObject loadConfigFile(String environment,
                                      String... configFilePaths)
                                               throws IOException
        Load the config file(s).
        Parameters:
        environment - name of the environment to load
        configFilePaths - paths the config files to load, local or remote
        Returns:
        ConfigObject with accumulated variables representing the environment
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading the config files

      • filterText

        public static String filterText(String input,
                List<TextFilter> filters)
                         throws IOException
        Return a String that has applied the list of filters to the input string. If there are no filters to apply just returns the input string.
        Parameters:
        input - Text to be filtered if there are filters defined
        filters - List of text filters to apply to the input text
        Returns:
        Filtered text or input text if no filters defined
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error getting the bytes from the filtered text

      • getStaticConfigurationParameters

        public static Set<org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.ConfigurationParameter> getStaticConfigurationParameters(Class c)
        Create the set of ConfigurationParameter objects from the Param class of an object.
        Parameters:
        c - Param class
        Returns:
        Set of ConfigurationParameter objects

      • parseMappingString

        public static Map<String,String> parseMappingString(String jsonString)
                                             throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
        Convert the JSON formatted string into a Map of Strings. i.e. {"jsonString":"class"}, {"C":"Valid","IR":"Invalid","IM":"InvalidMeasure"}
        Parameters:
        jsonString - JSON formatted validation string map
        Returns:
        HashMap of key, value string pairs. If jsonString is empty then returns an empty map.
        Throws:
        com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the JSON string is invalid
